column1: To display the latest reviews in your store, you must import the reviews. This can be done automatically or manually.
column2: To display the latest reviews in your store, you must import the reviews. This can be done automatically or manually.

column1: Use the Magento Cronjob to use the automatically import. A cronjob is a daemon which keeps running and gets activated at a said interval (time period).
column2: Use the Magento Cronjob to use the automatically import. A cronjob is a daemon which keeps running and gets activated at a said interval (time period).

column1: Select the schedule for automatic updating
column2: Select the schedule for automatic updating

column1: Show the latest reviews directly in the right or left area of your store to gain trust and directly show your client reviews.
column2: Show the latest reviews directly in the right or left area of your store to gain trust and directly show your client reviews.

column1:

column1: Send the invitation x days after the order is completed

column1: Send customers automatically receive an invitation to share a customer experience. This feature is only available for WebwinkelKeur PLUS members.
column2: Send customers automatically receive an invitation to share a customer experience. This feature is only available for WebwinkelKeur PLUS members.

column1: Specify at which status you want to send the invitation. Default is Completed
column2: Specify at which status you want to send the invitation. Default is Completed

column1: This will ensure that the customer receives the invitation shortly after receiving the product and not before. This increases the opportunity that the client will share his experience.
column2: This will ensure that the customer receives the invitation shortly after receiving the product and not before. This increases the opportunity that the client will share his experience.

column1: Number of days to complete order may last, if it takes longer then no invitation will be sent. Read more about this feature on WebwinkelKeur.nl.
column2: Number of days to complete order may last, if it takes longer then no invitation will be sent. Read more about this feature on WebwinkelKeur.nl.

column1:
The WebwinkelKeur javascript integration ensures that your WebwinkelKeur to load page on your own web store.
Now customers don't have to leave your store anymore to read the reviews.
This effectively increases your conversion!
column2:
The WebwinkelKeur javascript integration ensures that your WebwinkelKeur to load page on your own web store.
Now customers don't have to leave your store anymore to read the reviews.
This effectively increases your conversion!

column1: Whether to display the mouseover tooltip
column2: Whether to display the mouseover tooltip

column1: Showing the sidebar ensures a higher confidence. Visitors can read the reviews without leaving the store.
column2: Showing the sidebar ensures a higher confidence. Visitors can read the reviews without leaving the store.

column1: Showing the sidebar ensures a higher confidence. Visitors also do not have to leave to check the reviews which increases your conversion.
column2: Showing the sidebar ensures a higher confidence. Visitors also do not have to leave to check the reviews which increases your conversion.

column1:
Rich Snippets is a schema.org markup that makes it possible to give richer and more specific information.
The Rich Snippets will show your store rating in the google search engine results.

Use: {{block type=WebwinkelKeur/snippets" name="webwinkelsnippets"}} to call the block on the homepage.

"
column2:
Rich Snippets is a schema.org markup that makes it possible to give richer and more specific information.
The Rich Snippets will show your store rating in the google search engine results.

Use: {{block type=WebwinkelKeur/snippets" name="webwinkelsnippets"}} to call the block on the homepage.

"
